# Orc (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers (Su):** You gain the smite power, the ability to make a single melee attack with a bonus on the damage roll equal to your cleric level (if you hit). You must declare the smite before making the attack. It is usable once per day. If used against a dwarf or an elf, you get a +4 bonus on the smite attack roll.

**Orc Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Cause Fear (Spell)|Cause Fear]]****:** One creature of 5 HD or fewer flees for 1d4 rounds.

**2** **[[Produce Flame (Spell)|Produce Flame]]****:** 1d6 damage +1/level, touch or thrown.

**3** **[[Prayer (Spell)|Prayer]]****:** Allies +1 on most rolls, enemies â€“1 penalty.

**4** **[[Divine Power (Spell)|Divine Power]]****:** You gain attack bonus, +6 to Str, and 1 hp/level.

**5** **[[Prying Eyes (Spell)|Prying Eyes]]****:** 1d4 +1/level floating eyes scout for you.

**6** **[[Eyebite (Spell)|Eyebite]]****:** Subject becomes [[Panicked|panicked]], [[Sickened|sickened]], and [[Comatose (Spell)|comatose]].

**7** **[[Blasphemy (Spell)|Blasphemy]]****:** Kills, paralyzes, weakens, or dazes non-evil subject.

**8** **[[Cloak of Chaos (Spell)|Cloak of Chaos]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against lawful spells.

**9 [[Power Word Kill (Spell)|Power Word Kill]]:** Kills one creature with 100 hp or less.
